example_sentence_english: I'm looking for a room for two people.

example_sentence_italian: Ho prenotato una camera per stasera.
example_sentence_english: I booked a room for tonight.

example_sentence_italian: La camera ha una vista sul mare.
example_sentence_english: The room has a view of the sea.
Rooms available on the first floor.

example_sentence_italian: Le camere sono pronte per gli ospiti.
example_sentence_english: The rooms are ready for the guests.
There are still some rooms available.

example_sentence_italian: La porta della camera è rotta.
example_sentence_english: The door of the room is broken.

example_sentence_italian: Ho portato il bagaglio alla camera.
example_sentence_english: I took the luggage to the room.

example_sentence_italian: Ho consegnato le chiavi alle camere.
example_sentence_english: I delivered the keys to the rooms.

example_sentence_italian: Ho sentito rumori dalla camera accanto.
example_sentence_english: I heard noises from the next room.

example_sentence_italian: Le luci vengono dalle camere al piano di sotto.
example_sentence_english: The lights come from the rooms downstairs.
In the room there is a desk.

example_sentence_italian: Nelle camere ci sono armadi grandi.
example_sentence_english: There are big wardrobes in the rooms.

example_sentence_italian: Sulla camera è appeso un cartellino con il numero.
example_sentence_english: A tag with the number is hanging on the room.

example_sentence_italian: Sulle camere sono stati affissi nuovi numeri.
example_sentence_english: New numbers have been posted on the rooms.

example_sentence_italian: Con la camera è incluso il servizio in camera.
example_sentence_english: Room service is included with the room.

example_sentence_italian: Con le camere adiacenti abbiamo creato una suite.
example_sentence_english: With the adjacent rooms we created a suite.
